message.body: I'm really intensely sad about Ben moving to CaliforniaÂ
Don't be you can do better than him
I know I just feel weird. I've had a crush on him on and off since I was 10 years old
Omg one of my kids just lost his house in a fire and their dad lost his job. I want to help but idk how :(
Oh man..maybe like raise some money with your colleagues? Is that not socially appropriate?
I have no idea what's appropriate. I know the social worker reached out to them
Ask your co-workers what you can do!
Yeah I did. Poor Luciano :((( and his mom has a new baby omg I can't even imagine
I think the best thing you can do is be there for him and support him
Yeah :/ the world is so hard
